attributes.action: Stop allowing stupid people to start pointless petitions on this site.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: You must have an IQ greater than 5 to post a petition on the Downing street website.  Please, give Brucie a Knighthood!!  Get a life and worry about yourself not Brucie!!!!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
